title: Install LlamaIndex and create a VectorStoreIndex from JSON
goal: Allow querying MemoryBlocks semantically using LlamaIndex.
action_items: [ ] Add `llama-index` to the project dependencies (e.g., requirements.txt).
[ ] Export sample data from the Dolt `memory_blocks` table to a JSON file (using Task 1.3 functionality or `dolt sql -r json`).
[ ] Write a script to load this JSON data.
[ ] Convert the loaded JSON/MemoryBlocks into LlamaIndex `Document` objects (or skip if using Nodes directly in next step).
[ ] Configure an embedding model (e.g., use `llama-index-embeddings-huggingface` for BGE or configure OpenAI).
test_criteria: Run a sample semantic query using the index's query engine (e.g., `query_engine.query('What is governance?')`).
Verify that relevant Document(s)/Node(s) are returned based on the sample JSON data.
